ygData.msgSnippet: Lightspeed groggily pulls himself up. Every wire in his body strains at the effort to keep himself upright. Then as he looked out of the window, his jaw fell

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Lightspeed groggily pulls himself up. Every wire in his body strains at
the effort to keep himself upright. Then as he looked out of the window,
his jaw fell wide open. The rock they had crashed into was just as
beautiful as he remembered. They had arrived on earth. He felt all his
injurys leave him, and leapt up, throwing his fist triumphantly into the
air. "Yahhoooooo." he screamed. He then realized no one else was around,
he quickly ran along to try and find someone. He eventually stumbled
into the storage bay. With bewilderment he started. "Can you guys
believe it, it's magnificent." he said with pure excitemen, and a smile
so large, it looked like his face would fall of his hinges.
